name: J-Horror Game
description:
Something terrible happened in this house. Can you get out before the same happens to you?

Corny intro aside, I was making this game for the j-horror game jam back in October 2019, but then I didn't because that's just how it be sometimes.

This is a first person horror game (SHOCKING) and includes loud noises and jump scares so if that's something you're sensitive to, you might want to avoid this.

Controls:

Look around with the mouse

Move with wasd

Interact with E

Pause with ESC

1.1 notes

noticed some pretty glaring problems and some minor problems that I fixed.
